name: Giuseppe's Kidnapping
description:
When Giuseppe the Unintelligible Being gets kidnapped by a crazy murderer with a passion for torture, he is stuck in a mysterious room with a device on his back that sucks the blood out of him. Help him find the hole in every room and get him back to safety!

Controls:
-Use the arrow keys to walk around
-Press A to use a blood pack
-Press space to switch between camera and player
